body_content.explanation: a key that can be used to open any of several different locks:
examples: Eventually the hotel staff used a master key to open the door of the room.
Car burglars often have a master key that can open many vehicles.

body_content.explanation: something that can be used to solve many problems or explain many things:
examples: Self-control is the master key to the solution of all our troubles.
The physicist contests the idea that string theory is the master key to the secrets of the Universe.
